item.description:
http://www.mainelyangels.org/calendar.html

 

2011 Fall Foliage Frolic

All Day Event  Sep 23, 2011

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Maine-ly Angels

Maine chapter of Women on Wheels®

 

Invites you to:

2011 Fall Foliage Frolic

September 23-25, 2011

at

Royalty Inn

130 Main St

Gorham, NH 03581

603-466-3312

1-800-437-3529

www.royaltyinn.com

A block of rooms are being held for us at $99/night for up to 4 people in a room.  A Function room is being provided for the Fall Foliage Frolic Festivities at no extra charge. The on-site restaurant has breakfast available as well as dinner options for between $18.95-21.95 tax and tip included. 

Plans are being made for Saturday fun & games.
item.how_to_find_us: Fall Foliage is still going on, but unfortunately due to the rainy weather there is no scheduled ride Friday; many people will be driving their cars. If anything changes this site will be updated.
item.name: Fall Foliage remains but with no scheduled ride due to rain
